caption.p: Plots showing antibody units (AU) for S. Typhimurium ( A and C) and S. Enteritidis ( B and D) by age. Orange dots indicate HIV infected individuals. ( A, B). Females are indicated in red and males in blue ( C, D). The box shows the interquartile range (IQR) with middle line representing the median. The whiskers represent the adjacent values, defined as 1.5 Ã— IQR from the edge of the box, with values outside this range shown individually. LLOQ, lower limit of quantification.
